title: 大家认为什么服务器好玩？
author: _king_j
txt_content: 什么服务器好玩呢？？？（类型）

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
首先 这贴纸是日经贴 然后就回答你的问题 我认为竞技性最强的是小游戏服 其次RPG地图就是所谓的养老服啦 可以拉上你的好基友玩啊 个人观点





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: qirou

replies.author: Roko77
replies.txt_content: 为啥我觉得生存比较养老。。
我喜欢玩生存，现在自己开了个服务器，弄得就是生存+RPG，RPG正在建设中0.0

replies.author: _king_j
replies.txt_content:
qirou 发表于 2016-10-22 10:55
rpg比较好
rpg懒得弄=-=麻烦

replies.author: 元素丶火
replies.txt_content: 我觉得应该是小游戏，RPG就刷怪啊，VIP的就知道装逼，所以我觉得小游戏，类型多。
